metadata.name: Lurker Moon
metadata.description:
This moon be lurkin'.

Signature Videopainting by Sarah Zucker / @thesarahshow. Created in studio with 1991 Sony VideoPainter, digital animation and analog processing on VHS. Digitally Transferred in 1080p.

This piece was created as part of "The Cosmic Joke," a sticker set for use with a custom zoom background tool commissioned by Giphy in August 2020. The token reflects the original pre-sticker VHS art composition, and is minted with Giphy's permission.

Genesis Token #1 in VIDPAINT Contract.
